jobDescription: Job Title: Data ScientistLocation: San Jose, CAJob Description:Minimum Qualification: PhD or Masters in computer science, statistics, or related technical discipline  Deep knowledge of machine learning, statistics, optimization and related techniques to build application connecting business,Experience with Python, R, Matlab, Github, with expertise to build models and solutions for vision and Speech/NLPExperience with C, C++, Java, SQL plus other tools  Experience with working in Big data technologies i.e., Hadoop, Spark ML etc.,  Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and additional foreign languages like Chinese is a plusStrong work experience in data science with proven project experience is a mustprovided by Dice machine learning
